mapper.update: update t_dish set dish_Type_ID = #{dishTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dish_Name = #{dishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_Speel = #{dishSpeel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_Cost = #{dishCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dish_Unit = #{dishUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_Price = #{dishPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, dish_Description = #{dishDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_Cooking = #{dishCooking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_Img_Url = #{dishImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where dish_ID = #{dishId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select dish_ID, dish_Type_ID, dish_Name, dish_Speel, dish_Cost, dish_Unit, dish_Price, dish_Description, dish_Cooking, dish_Img_Url, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_dish where dish_ID = #{dishId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
